dict.acceptation: 穿（衣）( clothe的第三人称单数)；给…提供衣服；（用语言）表达；覆盖；

sent.orig: We'll go to Clothes For Kids, Family Clothes Shop and Cool Clothes.
sent.trans: 我们要去儿童服装店，家人服装店和酷儿服装店。

sent.orig: You come to Xinghua Clothes Shop to see the clothes yourself.
sent.trans: 你亲自来华兴服装店来看衣服。

sent.orig: His clothes, too, were a poor man's clothes.
The Emperor took off all his clothes, and put on the "new clothes"
sent.trans: 皇帝脱下他所有的衣服，穿上了“新衣服”

sent.orig: A man has his clothes made to fit him; a woman makes herself fit her clothes.
sent.trans: 埃德加·沃森·豪：男人让衣服适合他，女人让自己适合衣服。
